description: A major sanctuary of Coammagene and site of the mausoleum of Antiochus I (69–34 B.C.). A UNESCO World Heritage Site located on modern Mount Nemrut in Turkey's Adıyaman province.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Nemrut Dağ

properties.description: Peak of Nemrut Dağ. The location is a UNESCO World Heritage site, featuring a tomb for Antiochos I, king of Commagene.
properties.title: OSM location of Nemrut Dağ
